name: Shandelya Overseas
overview:
Our core activity lies in assisting students to make the right choice in pursuing their education in overseas educational institutions. Shandelya Overseas provides information about higher education in various countries like USA, UK, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland, Singapore, France, Switzerland, China…… and has a command over the education system worldwide.

We deal with several leading institutions in the USA, UK, Australia, Canada, New Zealand, Ireland, Singapore, France, Switzerland, China and a host of other prominent countries. Shandelya Overseas strength is its state of the art infrastructure coupled with immense experience in the industry. It is a one-stop destination for all students desirous of going abroad for further studies.

Shandelya Overseas goal is to enhance its driving force to conquer distant horizons and to strengthen and expand its expertise. Shandelya Overseas, an emerging giant in the field of ‘GLOBAL EDUCATION’, dispels all the myths usually associated with ‘overseas education’ and have brought the concept of overseas education to the doorstep of every student, by making it better affordable and devoid of cumbersome procedures. It aims to rigorously and actively promote foreign education in every city of India, with a special focus at the town level.
